divs: sighting detailsthis is a shot from the phoenix web cam on south mt taken last night. as for the debunker who cant handle the truth. we have permission to post here from one of the directors.im quite sure you are not one of them! there are a few of us that post the az web cam pics. i am one of the origionals that gave the link to everyone. we have posted over 20 different ufo's. not bird's not flares not garbage flying around in the sky! i sugest if you are not here to look at ufo's and real reports to go somewere else. ufo's have been flying around phoenix az every night this month and some in the day. for any one who would like to see for yourself here is the link. although some cams are down tonight due to rain in the area. http:\\www.phoenixvis.net\somt1\index.html
